entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
